content: and knit together a tutorial on how to knit loops is available from http //fluffandfuzz weebly com/knitting-tutorials/ how-to-knit-loops squirrel tail make 1 start at the tip of the tail cast on 16 sts in squirrel body grey on 3 25mm needles make 1 follow the fox body patt page 3 row 1 ws purl working all row in grey yarn only row 2 rs loop 16 times row 3 to 18 repeat row 1 and 2 eight more times squirrel ears cast off all sts make 2 follow the raccoon ears patt page 6 working all row in grey yarn only woodland tales mobile copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 6 of 10 hedgehog body row 35 k2 k2tog k3 ssk k3 k2tog k3 ssk k2 make 1 start at the bottom end cast on 9 sts in 17 sts brown on 3 25mm needles row 36 purl row 1 rs knit row 37 k1 k2tog k2 ssk k3 k2tog k2 ssk k1 row 2 ws k1 kfb 8 times 17 sts 13 sts row 3 knit row 38 purl row 4 k1 kfb k1 8 times 25 sts break the beige working yarn and join black for the nose row 5 knit row 39 k1 k2tog ssk k2tog k1 k2tog ssk k1 row 6 k1 kfb k2 8 times 33 sts 8 sts row 7 knit pull through to cast off row 8 k1 kfb k7 4 times 37 sts row 9 to 27 knit row 28 k7 ssk k2 3 times k1 k2tog k2 3 times k5 31 sts break the brown working yarn and join beige for the head row 29 knit row 30 purl row 31 k6 ssk k1 3 times k2 k2tog k1 3 times k5 25 sts row 32 purl acorn cup & nut row 33 k3 k2tog k4 ssk k3 2 times 21 sts make 1 start at the bottom of the acorn cup cast row 34 purl on 8 sts in brown on 3 25mm needles row 1 ws knit row 2 rs kfb 7 times k1 15 sts row 3 knit row 4 k1 kfb 7 times k1 22 sts row 5 6 and 7 knit break the brown working yarn and join green for the acorn nut row 8 to 11 starting on a rs knit row work 4 row in st st woodland tales mobile copyright © 2018 amanda berry page 7 of 10 row 12 k1 k2tog k5 3 times 19 sts row 13 purl row 14 k1 k2tog k4 3 times 16 sts row 15 purl row 16 k2tog 8 times 8 sts pull through to cast off toadstool stalk make 1 start at the bottom cast on 11 sts in white on 3 25mm needles row 1 ws purl row 2 rs k1 kfb k1 5 times 16 sts row 3 to 7 starting on a ws purl row work 5 row in st st row 8 9 and 10 knit row 11 purl row 12
